description: A road-marking crew is left red-faced after failing to give "clear" instructions to motorists.
title: Isle of Man motorists told to 'Keep Claer' in road-painting error
title_page: Isle of Man motorists told to 'Keep Claer' in road-painting error - BBC News
maintext: The words "keep claer" rather than "keep clear" were painted on a section of road on the outskirts of St John's, in the west of the island.
